casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Leon WATSON, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156637
COA: 333125 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 22, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellee to extend the time for filing an answer, as directed by this Court in its order dated June 15, 2018, is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before September 7, 2018.
